name: Cera's First Therapy Session
description:
Created by Team Toadhouse (c) 2020

This game is a smaller vignette of the larger game, Call Me Cera.

Call Me Cera is a game about adult friendships, setting healthy boundaries, and trying to navigate life in a world that feels like it doesn’t understand you.
We aim to destigmatize anxiety and cover themes of self care and living authentically.

The healthier Cera's choices, the more the story unfolds.

Find more vignettes of Cera's world to play through at https://teamtoadhouse.itch.io

Thank you for playing our game. 
Please follow us for further updates!
